pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Libraries from Dreamworks Animation for the efficient manipulation of volumetric data used in big budget movies like 'Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs2' and 'How to Train Your Dragon 2'.
This ebuild fork is to maintain compatibility with Blender. Blender is c++11 and they plan to skip c++14 support.
openvdb 7.1.0 looks like it breaks on Blender, so avoid using it.
This ebuild fork maximizes the update run for the slots based on the ABI with the tradeoff of higher maintenance cost. If conditional slots, were supported it would have been more efficient.
